name: Psycho Midget Ultra
description:
One Game A Month Entry ForJuly 2016 - Based on a selection of 3 words courtesy ofhttp://videogamena.me/. More test in coding state machines for simple AI then an actual game, but it is playable.

(Please note that due to personal responsibilities this month. Final player assets were not completed )

You play as psychotic Midget on a killing spree. You chase civilians around town, and attempt to dodge the police.

Currently the only goal is to get the high Score.

--- Controls

WASD to move

Space to jump

F - Stab with your knife.
